Metroid. It isn't even about people who likes vanilla. Troncol was just pointing out how dumb this is, there are so many more ways of making a believable r-18 doujin than this.

The ones who are more retarded than the butthurt vanillafags are the ones who write a wall of text trying to rationalize the hentai logic. Guess  which comment I'm referring to. Other than that this could have easily taken the incest route but mangaka tried to bring some twist into it which I think is a failure. The story is  too weak to make you rage as ntr and too twisted to make it vanilla. The ending is also kind of abrupt so hopefully there will be a sequel.
A happy ending if you ask me. No incest occurs.

This dude is an idiot, his IQ fell below ambient air temperature. His friend didn’t even know it was his mother... on the mother's defense, she is a widow (so no cheating), is obviously sexually frustrated, and did say on her profile that she just wants a fling; nothing more. Instead of confronting her, the son used his friend which he gave in to mother's offer. But the son thinks it's justifiable to blackmail his friend and rape said friend's mother? The villain is pretty much the son.
lol, hentai logic strikes again xD
